custom-action.name: azuremonitoring
custom-action.description:
The AzureMonitoring Action will get metrics from Azure Insights and send NeoLoad computed ones. The list is available at: https://github.com/Neotys-Labs/Azure
Possible parameters are: - applicationId (required): Application ID Monitored by Azure INsights Default value is "Application ID". - AzureApiKey (required): Azure API key Default value is "Azure API key.". - AzureManagedHostname (optional): Azure Insights custom Hostname Default value is "Azure Insights custom Hostname". - dataExchangeApiUrl (optional): Where the DataExchange server is located. Optional, by default it is: http://${NL-ControllerIp}:7400/DataExchange/v1/Service.svc/ - dataExchangeApiKey (optional): Identification key specified in NeoLoad. - proxyName (optional): The NeoLoad proxy name to access Dynatrace. - traceMode (optional)
